mdRecord.dcterms:title: Meeting of the State Agents Negro Rural Schools. Roosevelt Hotel. Seated Left to right: J.E. Williams, Assistant, Louisiana, D.B. Taylor, Assistant-Texas, E.A. McGehee Jr.-Assistant-Alabama, F.M.Alexander-Virginia, N.C.Newbold-N Carolina, Nolen M. Irby, Former Assistant-Arkansas now University of Georgia. Standing, left to right: L.M. Lester, Assistant-Georgia,WA Schiffley, Assistant-S. Carolina, JA Travis, Assistant-Mississippi, DE William-Florida,GH Ferguson, Assistant-N.
